name: glossario-pmca
author: Páramo Software <email@email.com>
description: Glossário de conservação-restauro de livros e documentos em papel do Projeto Manuel Correia de Andrade (PMCA)

scripts.scaffold: pnpm install && pnpm prisma generate && pnpm prisma db push && pnpm prima:seed-basis
scripts.electron:build: nuxt build && pnpm prisma:prod && pnpm prima:seed-basis && node build.js
scripts.electron:build-test: nuxt build && pnpm prisma:create-db && pnpm prima:seed-test && NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=electron-builder node build.js
scripts.prisma:prod: pnpm prisma generate && pnpm prisma migrate deploy --schema .output/server/node_modules/.prisma/client/schema.prisma && pnpm prisma db push --schema .output/server/node_modules/.prisma/client/schema.prisma
